Title: Innocent Might Be a Bit of a Stretch
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Chad Feehan
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Hood has been arrested for Rebecca's murder. FBI agent Veronica Dawson has come to Banshee to take over the serial killer case. Carrie attacks a Proctor drug processing factory. Another woman has been taken. Job's nightmares continue.
